page.title: 08Organisations in Newent
page.content:
Newent is the social centre for north-west Gloucestershire and this is reflected in the number of clubs and organisations that cater for interests throughout the area. Here are just a few examples from a choice of more than 100: ORGANISATIONS CLUBS
Girl Guides Young Farmers Gloucester Trust for Cricket Nature Conservancy Disabled Persons Women's Institute Cervical Cancer Choral Society Angling Housewives Register Over 60's Mother and Toddlers Badminton Campaign for Nuclear Probus Disarmament Old Time Dance Pre-School Playgroup Camera 18 Plus Group Bridge Bee Keepers Winemaking Friends of Newent School
